hadiths.text: Anas reported that Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) called for water and he was given a vessel and the people began to perform ablution in that and I counted (the persons) and they were between sixty and eighty and I saw water which was spouting from his fingers

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي مُعْجِزَاتِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
